text: Beaumont Chase is a civil parish in the county of Rutland in the East Midlands of England. It is to the west of Uppingham, north of Stoke Dry, and on a hillside overlooking Leicestershire. Formerly an extra-parochial area, it was created a separate parish in 1858. There is one occupied building, a farmhouse. According to the 2001 census, Beaumont Chase had a population of zero. ==References== Category:Civil parishes in Rutland Category:Uppingham
title: Beaumont Chase
